headline: Altria Group, Inc. (MO): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Altria Group, Inc. on DividendInvestor’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on MO. Altria Group, Inc.’s share was trading at $66.54 as of February 17th. MO’s trailing and forward P/E were 16.32 and 12.00 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Altria Group, Inc., through its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells smokeable and oral tobacco products in the United States. MO enters 2026 with the market once again questioning the durabil
